The Password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

source.g: What aspect of systems design allows you to build for multiple uses, viewpoints, and structures?
Incorrect. While important, accessibility is not the main focus of the systems design approach.
Incorrect. Here’s some clarity: The systems design approach is not primarily focused on clarity.
Incorrect. Durability is not the focus of the systems design approach.
Correct. The systems design approach to designing a user experience is primarily focused on scalability.
In systems design, the most important relationship is the one between which two entities?
Incorrect. Systems design is not based on the relationship between micro and macropatterns.
Incorrect. While important, the relationship between these two entities is not the foundational relationship of systems design.
Incorrect. The link between system and user requirements is not the most important relationship in systems design.
Individual elements and the overall user experience
Correct. The foundation of systems design is recognizing that the relationships between elements are more important than the individual elements.
What is an example of a macropattern?
Incorrect. The action of clicking next does not fit the definition of a macropattern.
Correct. Creating a record in Salesforce is repeatable, fits multiple record types, and represents a high-level interaction.
Incorrect. Making a button is more of a micropattern than a macropattern.
Incorrect. Calculating UX debt is not considered a macropattern.
When considering how a button relates to the rest of an established design system, what must you keep in mind?
Correct. When designing a new button, the existing button hierarchy must be taken into consideration.
Incorrect. Geometric shapes are not a consideration in how a new button relates to the current buttons in the design system.
Incorrect. Color is important but not in relation to the design system.
Incorrect. Macro and micropatterns are not considered when relating a button to the rest of the design system.

A UX designer has created a prototype on a sandbox containing various assets from the SLDS, such as icons and buttons. It will be developed using Lightning components. After reviewing, the customer requests the colors be changed to their company’s brand colors. Which feature should the designer recommend?
Incorrect. Loading a custom SVG is not efficient or scalable.
Correct. Styling hooks are placeholders in the SLDS style sheet.
Incorrect. A SLDS class would not work to meet the requirements.
Incorrect. While custom CSS classes would work, they are not as scalable as other options.
